meanings.definition: A person who specializes in metallurgy.
meanings.sent1: The metallurgists at the factory create new metal alloys.
meanings.sent2: Metallurgists play a crucial role in developing stronger materials for construction.
meanings.sent3: The group of metallurgists had a 'metallic' themed costume party.
meanings.sent4: The city's growth was forged by the hard work of metallurgists.
meanings.sent5: The metallurgists' expertise turned ordinary metals into valuable treasures.

meanings.definition: Those who study and work with metals and their properties.
meanings.sent1: Many metallurgists conduct experiments to understand metal behavior.
meanings.sent2: The team of metallurgists analyzed the composition of the ancient metal artifacts.
meanings.sent3: The metallurgists joked that they could 'metal-ize' anything.
meanings.sent4: In the world of creativity, metallurgists are the alchemists of modern times.
meanings.sent5: The metallurgists' workshop gleamed with the promise of new discoveries.
